General.Name: Fernheizwerk Neukölln Aktiengesellschaft
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Fernheizwerk Neukölln Aktiengesellschaft operates as a district heating supplier. It generates and distributes heating energy to approximately 40,000 households, as well as various department stores, hotels, other commercial and industrial customers, and public facilities primarily in the district of Neukölln, Berlin. The company also rents commercial premises. Fernheizwerk Neukölln Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1911 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
